channel.title: MAC 开发环境 on Tsing Wind - 清风徐来 水波不兴
channel.description: Recent content in MAC 开发环境 on Tsing Wind - 清风徐来 水波不兴

item.title: 从头开始设置MAC开发环境
item.description: 已有配置文件 1 git clone https://github.com/kiyonlin/config.git linux vim vim插件 zsh phpstorm sumlime text HomeBrew, iterm and oh-my-zsh /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 安装iterm 去掉native full screen window、配置字体、快速启动热键 sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh)"
